abstract: Abdel-Kader Keïta (born 6 August 1981) is an Ivorian professional football player who plays for Budapest Honvéd FC. Keïta also plays as a winger for the Ivory Coast national football team.Like the Touré brothers, the Kalou brothers, and the Koné brothers, Keïta is also part of a footballing family. He has an older brother called Fadel Keïta, who is a former Ivorian international.
